DELETE FROM CART WHERE PID=${} AND MID=${mid}
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET PCOUNT=${} WHERE PID=${} AND MID=${}
mapper.select:
SELECT BID, MID, BTITLE, BPICK, BCREATE, BUPDATE, BVIEWCOUNT FROM BOARD WHERE MID=${} AND
BCID=0 AND
BCID=1 AND
BCID=2 AND
(BTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchword}||'%' OR BCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchword}||'%')
BTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchword}||'%'
BCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchword}||'%'
AND BSTATE='A' ORDER BY BID DESC

SELECT R.RID, R.BID, B.BTITLE, R.RCONTENT FROM BOARD B JOIN REPLY R ON B.BID = R.RID AND R.MID=${} WHERE
B.BCID=0 AND
B.BCID=1 AND
B.BCID=2 AND
R.RCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchword}||'%'
AND B.BSTATE='A' ORDER BY BID DESC

SELECT B.BID, B.BTITLE, B.BPICK, B.BREATE, B.BUPDATE, B.BVIEWCOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN BOOKMARK BM ON BM.BID = B.BID AND BM.MID=${} WHERE
B.BCID=0 AND
B.BCID=1 AND
B.BCID=2 AND
(B.BTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchword}||'%' OR B.BCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchword}||'%')
B.BTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchword}||'%'
B.BCONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchword}||'%'
AND BSTATE='A' ORDER BY B.BID DESC
